import { Icon , Row , Col , Layout } from 'antd'; import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch'; import Link from 'next/link'; import "../assets/styles.less"; import Carousel from '../components/carousel'; import Card from '../components/card' import WeatherAPP from '../components/weather'; const {Header, Content} = Layout; const Index = props => (
Welcome to Dora Blog
> About us
> Blog
    {props.shows.map(show => (
  • {show.name}
    • ))}
© 2020 Dora Blog
); Index.getInitialProps = async function() { const res = await fetch('https://www.travel.taipei/open-api/zh-tw/Attractions/All'); const data = await res.json(); console.log(`Show data fetched. Count: ${data.length}`); return { shows: data.map(entry => entry.show) }; }; export default Index;
